channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Bit new to mopar... i know the basic shit and stuff like how to add to invent blah blah blah...
But how do i go onto other people's servers so i can play with other people it always comes up ''Error conneting to server must be down click cancel then start server to make your own''
Its damn annoying
+How do i put down NPC'S i cant get around that one
1 more thing... if you get on other peoples servers can you PK?
Thanks
-Simon

item.title: Help please
